description: Fighting in Heaven is a bit different than normal: one can go all in since there's no damage to recover from.  This variation is focused on a mix between style and elegance brandishing exotic weapons, with equal parts brute force.  Like ballet but deadly.
initiate: You relax yourself and prepare to enter combat.

static_buffs.name: Celestial stance (Oarfish)
static_buffs.description: Your poise allows you to easily evade incoming attacks.  Like a fish swimming through, your evasion is increased while your blocking chance is decreased.

//: Not sure if block_effectiveness is actually block chance. block seems to be block value, so it makes sense block_effectiveness is related to chance

onhit_buffs.name: Dance combo
onhit_buffs.description: Allows using Earthen crescent after landing attacks.

ondodge_buffs.name: Celestial opportunity
ondodge_buffs.description: Evading attacks allows you to repositioning yourself and break through the opponent's defenses.  Physical attacks ignore defenses by a factor of your agility and perception.

oncrit_buffs.name: Celestial elegance
oncrit_buffs.description: Landing critical hits on enemies is electrifying, it allows you to evade attacks more easily.

//2: Changed the bonus electric damage for arpen, as Iku's spells scale from dodge now (and this stacks twice)

onmove_buffs.name: Celestial grace
onmove_buffs.description: Moving around stimulates you, increasing your critical chance the more you move…

onmove_buffs.name: Celestial grace (debuff)
onmove_buffs.description: …also decreasing your physical damage and evasion immediately after.  Dampening.

onpause_buffs.name: Lighting step
onpause_buffs.description: "Grounding" a portion of the stored charge on a target keeps the energy flowing.

description: Fighting in Heaven is a bit different than normal: one can go all in since there's no damage to recover from.  This variation is a further simplification that focuses on applying excessive force with little, if any, proper defensive maneuvers.  Not that you needed them before anyways.
initiate: You enter a combat stance and hope for an interesting fight.

static_buffs.name: Celestial stance (Fallen)
static_buffs.description: You're used to do as much damage as possible without care for your safety.  Solid as a keystone, your chance to land hits is increased and evasive actions are reduced.

onhit_buffs.name: Celestial devastation
onhit_buffs.description: Successful attacks enable you to perceive the flow of the fight better, allowing you to break through, quite literally.
onhit_buffs.//: Should tag a debuff on enemies

onhit_buffs.name: Sphere of perception
onhit_buffs.description: Effective attacks allow you to briefly read the spirit of the target.  You're more aware of their actions…

oncrit_buffs.name: Sphere of non-perception
oncrit_buffs.description: …Which interfers with your own focus.  Landing critical attacks prevents your next attack from being as effective.
oncrit_buffs.//: Ideally, this should reset buff_celestial_brawling_tenko_onhit2 when procced

onpause_buffs.name: Focus
onpause_buffs.description: You take your time considering the best course of action.  For like 1 second, this isn't your thing.

description: Noh is an artistic expression encompassing theater, dance and music.  You are a menreiki, the embodiment of the art, naturally skilled in performing it.  You can use it as a martial art, based on combining movement between attacks.
initiate: You relax yourself and adopt a staging pose.
%s relaxes and adopts a staging pose.

static_buffs.name: One-mask-party
static_buffs.description: Yourself, basically.  You get different effects according to your currently equipped mask.  You're always slightly more evasive, at the very least.

onhit_buffs.name: Cadence
onhit_buffs.description: Successful attacks grant you increased movement speed.

ondodge_buffs.name: Reposition
ondodge_buffs.description: Evading attacks grants you increased chance to land effective attacks.

onpause_buffs.name: Emphasize
onpause_buffs.description: Proper stops highlight the message.  Stopping increases your parry value and number for an instant.

//2: WIP. Also enable a technique by doing this

description: Though Tai Chi is often seen as a form of mental and physical exercise, it is a legitimate martial art, focused on self-defense.  By reading qi, you're able to parry more and better.  Parrying also greatly increases counter damage, while pausing for a second improves your response to physical damage and gives you insight on foe's weak points.
initiate: You settle into a gentle stance and prepare to defend yourself.

static_buffs.name: Tai Chi Stance (Youkai)
static_buffs.description: You are focused on defending a position and predicting your opponents attacks.  This enables extra blocks that scale from your agility, intelligence and strength, at the cost of reducing your evasion.

onblock_buffs.name: Opening found
onblock_buffs.description: Your no-nonsense positioning allows you to quickly deal double damage immediately after blocking attacks.  Also, you gain extra accuracy, virtue of recognizing and reacting to movement patterns.

onblock_buffs.name: Counter block
onblock_buffs.description: Allows using Repulse the intruder and Stay out after blocking attacks.

onpause_buffs.name: Great Wall
onpause_buffs.description: By taking a second to enter a guarding stance, you prepare yourself to redirect the qi of the next enemy attack through enemy defenses.

description: Mokou's fighting style, learned over centuries of brawling, killing and being killed by her rival.  It's brutal, dirty, effective yet simple: hit and hit harder.
initiate: You prepare yourself to fight once more.

static_buffs.name: Immortal experience
static_buffs.description: Your fighting skill allows you to block more damage, scaling from strength and dexterity.  Your physical damage is also above average.
static_buffs.//: Change the mult_bonuses for a 1 + rand(1.00) when possible
static_buffs.//2: Do note she also has the KI_STRIKE mutation, so her unarmed dmg is already scaling from skills

onattack_buffs.name: Hourai's high
onattack_buffs.description: Attacks have an increased chance to be effective.

ongethit_buffs.name: Every hit counts
ongethit_buffs.description: Repeatedly getting hit increases your accuracy and blocking chance for a short duration.

//2: That description assuming block_effectiveness is blocking chance

onpause_buffs.name: One second against eternity
onpause_buffs.description: Not used to stop in the middle of a fight, your accuracy and physical damage is reduced.  At the same time, this slightly increases your dodge chance.

onkill_buffs.name: That which is unattainable
onkill_buffs.description: Life is something curious: you can easily take it from others, except for the actual targets of your grudge.  Once you get going it's easier for you to do it.

//: ADD basic brawling techniques, RECHECK her techs with braling, do brawling -> mokou_ma

description: Your personal fighting style, learned over decades of sword training, plus some gardening component that helped too.  People say you may just be *too* tunnel-visioned about it.
initiate: You take a firm grasp of your weapon.

static_buffs.name: Kenjutsu (incomplete)
static_buffs.description: You were trained in the art of the sword.  Although you didn't reach completion, you're still very skilled at it.  Grants improved block and increased damage when using eastern swords.

//4: Removed the stat dodge bonus as her spells scale from dodge now

onattack_buffs.name: Training results
onattack_buffs.description: Direct your attacks towards maximizing the effectiveness of your attacks.  Muscle memory with swords reduces the efficacy of blunt and piercing weapons.

oncrit_buffs.name: Phantasmal strike
oncrit_buffs.description: Landing attacks is more and more easy once you get going.

onmove_buffs.name: Half-phantom walk
onmove_buffs.description: Stride like a spirit (and hit like one).

//3: Removed the stat dodge bonus as her spells scale from dodge now

onpause_buffs.name: Half-phantom rest
onpause_buffs.description: Pause, clear your mind, and prepare yourself for what follows, increasing accuracy and greatly increasing crit chance.  Ever heard about the concept of emptiness, though? Way harder than it sounds, like trying to think about no thing.

//: Based on the pre-rework style_niten, inverting most stuff
//2: (50, 67, 33, 50, 67) crit chance for (pause, pause+crit, crit x2, crit x3, crit x4). Youmu has -1 crit to rely more on her martial art procs
